alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 10:01AM PST until March 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Lingering light snow showers today. Heavy snow possible Thursday into Sunday. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 to 80 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Thursday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 3000 to 5000 feet Thursday, rising quickly to 6000 to 8000 feet by Friday morning..
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
